_comment: Copy this file to app-config.json and fill in your values before running @app-starter agent
_router_base_path_help: Base path for Vue Router (e.g., '/omni-inventory-manager/' or '/' for standalone apps)
_api_base_path_help: Base API path for backend proxying (e.g., '/api/inventory')
_default_port_help: Development server port (e.g., 3000, 8080). Must be unique if running multiple apps.
_include_component_library_help: Include @RoyalAholdDelhaize/pdl-spectrum-component-library-web? ('yes' or 'no'). Requires GitHub token if 'yes'.
_vue_api_pattern_help: Vue API style: 'composition-api' (recommended for Vue 3) or 'options-api' (Vue 2 style)
_state_management_help: State management library: 'pinia' (recommended for Vue 3) or 'vuex' (legacy)
_use_latest_versions_help: Fetch latest package versions from npm? ('yes' for latest, 'no' for pinned versions from versions.json)
